channel.title: D claws disconnect?
channel.description: when i use dragon claw special attack on players (works fine on npcs!) i get disconnected and reconnected. yes i have the special attack code... here is what happens in the run.bat when i do the spec: [img]http://img219.imageshack.us/img219/1315/sdfgjdofi.png[/img]
